text: José Évrard (17 July 1945 – 7 January 2022) was a French politician. He was the member of the National Assembly for the 3rd constituency of Pas-de-Calais from 2017 until 2021. He was a member of the National Front (FN) until 2017. He then joined The Patriots (LP), which he left in 2020 to become a member of Debout la France (DLF). Évrard was born in Cauchy-à-la-Tour, France. Évrard died on 7 January 2022 from COVID-19, aged 76.Le député du Pas-de-Calais José Evrard décède des suites du Covid-19 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Hauts-de-France Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in France Category:People from Pas-de-Calais
title: José Évrard
